titleHead: Hearing availability - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Your availability for a hearing
subtitle: Do you have any dates when you can’t attend a hearing? For example, because you’re going on holiday or have an important appointment which can’t be moved.

scheduleHearing.label: Select whether there are dates you can't attend or not
scheduleHearing.yes: I need to tell you about dates when I can’t attend a hearing
scheduleHearing.no: I will come to a hearing whenever you schedule it

error.required: Enter a date when you can't attend a hearing
